trans-unit.target: Azure Active Directory Connect - Learn More

trans-unit.source: Learn more about Azure AD Connect.
trans-unit.target: Learn more about Azure AD Connect.

trans-unit.source: Azure Active Directory Connect - Learn More
trans-unit.target: Azure Active Directory Connect - Learn More

trans-unit.source: The following is a list of additional resources for using Azure AD Connect and integrating your on-premises directories with Azure AD.
trans-unit.target: The following is a list of additional resources for using Azure AD Connect and integrating your on-premises directories with Azure AD.

trans-unit.source: Azure AD Connect incorporates the components and functionality previously released as Dirsync and AAD Sync.
trans-unit.target: Azure AD Connect incorporates the components and functionality previously released as Dirsync and AAD Sync.

trans-unit.source: These tools are no longer being released individually, and all future improvements will be included in updates to Azure AD Connect, so that you always know where to get the most current functionality.
trans-unit.target: These tools are no longer being released individually, and all future improvements will be included in updates to Azure AD Connect, so that you always know where to get the most current functionality.

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Multi-forest Directory Sync with Single Sign-On Scenario</linkText><title></title></link> - Integrate multiple directories with Azure AD.
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Multi-forest Directory Sync with Single Sign-On Scenario</linkText><title></title></link> - Integrate multiple directories with Azure AD.

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Azure AD Connect Health</linkText><title></title></link> - Monitor the health of your on-premises AD FS infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Azure AD Connect Health</linkText><title></title></link> - Monitor the health of your on-premises AD FS infrastructure.

trans-unit.source: Ignite 2015 presentation on extending your on-premises directories to the cloud.
trans-unit.target: Ignite 2015 presentation on extending your on-premises directories to the cloud.

trans-unit.source: Watch this video to learn how easy it is to extend your on-premises Active Directory to the cloud by using the express settings of Azure Active Directory Connect.
trans-unit.target: Watch this video to learn how easy it is to extend your on-premises Active Directory to the cloud by using the express settings of Azure Active Directory Connect.
